name: OG Strawberry
description: OG Strawberry, grown on the southwest ridgeline of Mendocino County by HappyDays Farms, is an indica-dominant hybrid strain that delivers crushing effects alongside a sour fuel aroma. With a THC content that can stretch to 29%, OG Strawberry is a force to be reckoned with. This hybrid combines parent strains OG Kush and Island Strawberry Afghani Indica, a union of potency that will impress even the seasoned veteran.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Creative, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Fatigue, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
